Package io.atomix.core.transaction

Interfaces for managing distributed primitive transactions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncTransaction
    Asynchronous transaction.
    AsyncTransactionalMap<K,V>
    Asynchronous transactional map.
    AsyncTransactionalSet<E>
    Transactional set.
    ManagedTransactionService
    Managed transaction service.
    Transaction
    Transaction primitive.
    Transactional<T>
    Interface for transactional primitives.
    TransactionalMap<K,V>
    Transactional map.
    TransactionalSet<E>
    Transactional set.
    TransactionParticipant<T>
    Transaction participant.
    TransactionService
    Transaction service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ParticipantInfo
    Transaction participant info.
    TransactionalMapBuilder<K,V>
    Transactional map builder.
    TransactionalMapConfig
    Transactional map configuration.
    TransactionalSetBuilder<E>
    Transactional set builder.
    TransactionalSetConfig
    Transactional set configuration.
    TransactionBuilder
    Transaction builder.
    TransactionConfig
    Transaction configuration.
    TransactionId
    Transaction identifier.
    TransactionLog<T>
    Collection of transaction updates to be applied atomically.
    TransactionType
    Transaction primitive type.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommitStatus
    Transaction commit status.
    Isolation
    Transaction isolation levels.
    TransactionState
    Transaction state.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TransactionException
    Transaction exception.

Interfaces for managing distributed primitive transactions.
